alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 08 at 1:09PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Big Wood River at Hailey. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.7 feet, Near bankfull from Ketchum down-river to Glendale Road Bridge south of Bellevue. Some lowland seepage and ponding is possible in residential areas near the river especially in the Della View subdivision on far western War Eagle Drive. Gimlet subdivision may experience ponding. At 5.0 feet, Street flooding will occur along Cedar, War Eagle, and Della Vista Drives in the lower subdivisions in Hailey and Riverview drive in Bellevue. Draper Preserve in Hailey is inaccessible. Water may be over some secondary roads in West Ketchum (Wood River Drive). Gimlet subdivision will have flooding issues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM MDT Sunday, May 07 the stage was 4.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 4.2 feet this evening. It will then rise to 4.5 feet early Friday morning. It will fall to 4.4 feet Saturday morning. It will then rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Action stage is 3.7 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Wood River Hailey 5.0 4.3 Sun 9 am MDT 4.1 4.1 4.3 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
